coreservlets.function

Class EmployeeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • coreservlets.function.EmployeeUtils

  • public class EmployeeUtils
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      static Employee findEmployeeByFirstName(java.util.List<Employee> employees, java.lang.String firstName)
      Returns the first employee from the List that has the given first name.

    • Method Detail

      • findEmployeeByFirstName

        public static Employee findEmployeeByFirstName(java.util.List<Employee> employees,
                                               java.lang.String firstName)
        Returns the first employee from the List that has the given first name. Returns null if no matches are found. Note that if would be better to return Optional instead of null; Optional will be discussed in later tutorial section.

      • findEmployeeBySalary

        public static Employee findEmployeeBySalary(java.util.List<Employee> employees,
                                            double salaryCutoff)
        Returns the first employee from the list that has a salary greater than or equal to the specified salary cutoff. Returns null if no matches are found.

      • firstMatchingEmployee

        public static Employee firstMatchingEmployee(java.util.List<Employee> candidates,
                                             java.util.function.Predicate<Employee> matchFunction)
        Returns first Employee from list that passes the match function. See LambdaUtils.firstMatch for a generalized version of this method.

      • randomPerson

        public static Person randomPerson()

      • salarySum

        public static int salarySum(java.util.List<Employee> employees)
        Computes the sum of the salary of the given employees. See FunctionUtils.mapSum for a genericized version of this method.
